document.docAuthor: Larson, Helen K., Jaafar, Zeehan & Lim, Kelvin K. P.
document.masterDocTitle: An Annotated Checklist Of The Gobioid Fishes Of Singapore

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: An Annotated Checklist Of The Gobioid Fishes Of Singapore

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Apocryptes madurensis Bleeker, 1849: 35
(Freto Madurae prope Surabaya et Bangcallang, Java , Indonesia ).

subSubSection.paragraph:
Apocryptodon sealei
â€“ Herre & Myers, 1937: 46 (reef at Singapore ).
ZRC material from: Pulau Hantu, Sarimbun mangroves, Pasir Ris,
Pulau Ubin.

Gobius boddarti Pallas, 1770: 11
, Pl.2, Figs. 4â€“5 (Indian Ocean).

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Boleopthalmus boddaerti
â€“
Gomez, 1980: 95
( Singapore ).

subSubSection.paragraph: ZRC material from: Sungei Pandan, Sungei Berih, Sungei Poyan,
Sungei Buloh, Sungei Seletar, Pulau Seletar, Punggol, Sungei
Serangoon, Pasir Ris.

Oxuderces dentatus Eydoux & Souleyet, 1848: 182
, Pl. 8, Fig. 3 ( Macao ); Lim & Larson, 1994: 260 ( Singapore ).
Remarks: No recent material from Singapore observed.

Apocryptes serperaster Richardson, 1846: 206
( Macao , China ).

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Parapocryptes macrolepis
â€“
Fowler, 1938: 219
( Singapore ); Koumans, 1953: 251 ( Singapore ).

subSubSection.paragraph: ZRC material from: Sungei Seletar.

Gobius schlosseri Pallas, 1770: 5
, Pl. 1, Figs. 1â€“4 ( Ambon , Indonesia ).
ZRC material from: Pasir Panjang, Sungei Pandan, Sungei Tengeh,
Pulau Buloh, Sungei Buloh, Sungei Kranji, Mandai mangroves,
Sungei Simpang, Khatib Bongsu, Sungei Seletar, Loyang mangroves, Pulau Ubin, Changi Point.

Periophthalmus argentilineatus Valenciennes, 1837: 191
(Lâ€™ile de Waigio and dâ€™Oualan and Java and New Guinea ); Lim & Larson, 1994: 260 ( Singapore ); Larson & Lim, 2005: 130.
ZRC material from: Sungei Kallang, Sungei Sembawang, Sungei
Simpang, Pulau Ubin, Changi Point.

?
Periophthalmus Koelreuteri
â€“ Karoli, 1882: 166 ( Singapore ).

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Periophthalmus barbarus
â€“
Fowler, 1938: 220
(Serangoon, Singapore ).

subSubSection.paragraph: ZRC material from: Siglap canal, West Coast Park, Pulau Retan Laut, Raffles Lighthouse, Pulau Seletar, Pasir Ris, Pulau Ubin, Changi beach, Pulau Tekong.

Remarks: Karoliâ€™s
Periophthalmus koelreuteri
is possibly this species; he included material from Japan and Borneo under the same name.
ZRC material from: Fort Road canal, St Johnâ€™s Island, Lim Chu
Kang mangroves, Sungei Simpang, Pulau Seletar, Sungei Serangoon,
Pulau Tekong.
Remarks: The types of this species were destroyed in WWII (Murdy,
1989). No recent material from Singapore observed.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Gobius novemradiatus Hamilton, 1822: 47
, 366, Pl. 2, Fig. 14 (Uttarbhag, Ganges Delta, India ).

subSubSection.paragraph:
Tan & Yeo , 2003: 40 (Chek Jawa ); Anonymous, 2003: 94 (Sungei Buloh); Larson & Lim , 2005: 133 (Sungei Simpang, Loyang mangroves)
.
ZRC material from: Siglap canal, St Johnâ€™s Island, Sungei Pandan,
Lim Chu Kang mangroves, Sungei Simpang, Khatib Bongsu, Pulau
Seletar, Punggol, Sungei Serangoon, Loyang mangroves, Pulau
Ubin, Pulau Tekong.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Periophthalmus walailakae Darumas and Tantichodok, 2001: 102â€“ 106
(Ngo, Ranong Province , southern Thailand );
Anonymous, 2003: 94
(Sungei Buloh); Larson & Lim, 2005: 134 (Seletar Dam, Sungei Simpang).

Periophthalmus novemradiatus
(non-Hamilton) â€“
Chua et al., 2003: 54
( Singapore ).

subSubSection.paragraph: ZRC material from: Sungei Buloh, Sungei Simpang, Khatib Bongsu,
Pulau Seletar, Pasir Ris, Pulau Ubin.
Remarks: Jaafar et al., (2006) discussed this species in Singapore ,

in comparison with
Periophthalmodon schlosseri
.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Apocryptes borneensis Bleeker, 1855b: 421
(Bandjermassing, Borneo, Indonesia ).

subSubSection.paragraph: Remarks: No recent material from Singapore observed.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Gobius elongatus Cuvier, 1816: 255
( Tranquebar ).

Apocryptes changua
â€“
Bleeker, 1852a: 53
, 58 ( Singapore ).

Pseudopocrptes [sic] lanceolatus
â€“
Anonymous, 2003: 94
(Sungei Buloh).
Pseudapocryptes elongatus
â€“ Larson & Lim, 2005: 139 ( Singapore ). ZRC material from: Sungei Pandan, Sungei Buloh, Sungei Punggol, Pasir Ris, Pulau Tekong.

caption.paragraph:
Fig. 2.
Calamiana polylepis
from Pasir Ris, ZRC 50569: a, 21 mm SL male; b, 21 mm SL female. Photographs by Tan Heok Hui.

Fig. 3.
Amblyeleotris periophthalma
at Pulau Hantu. Photograph by Jani Thuaibah.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Boleophthalmus histophorus Valenciennes, 1837: 210
( Bombay and Ganges River).
ZRC material from: Pasir Ris, Pulau Ubin.
